body_html: It's awesome you managed to port ATen so easily! On one hand you're right, portability makes it easy to use it on a lot of different platforms, but the last time I checked, our math code was actually terribly slow when ran in the browser (and the JS file was quite huge). Are you getting some reasonable results now? What's the size of the JS file?

body: It's awesome you managed to port ATen so easily! On one hand you're right, portability makes it easy to use it on a lot of different platforms, but the last time I checked, our math code was actually *terribly* slow when ran in the browser (and the JS file was quite huge). Are you getting some reasonable results now? What's the size of the JS file?
